title: Special Transport Service for New Year
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Transport Commission (NTC) said that steps have been taken to provide fuel for long-distance private buses through the Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB) Depot during the Sinhala &Tamil New Year season.
The Director-General of the NTC, Nilan Miranda said that fuel is currently being supplied through five SLTB depots.
